website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for those who have a lot of books or decorative items that they need to store.
pros: Sturdy shelves that can support a lot of weight
cons: You may want to secure it to the wall because some users have said it wobbles

customer_reviews.title: Where Has This Been All My Life?  *So Easy!*
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d bought this years ago! Exactly as shown online and in the video. Arrives in a box wrapped in protective wrapping. Take out a section (will be two that stack if you buy the taller bookcase), open the sides, and the shelves fold down like vertical blinds. (new term—>Horizontal blinds!) SO EASY! And then just put the top shelf on and DONE. No stupid tiny wrench, no pegs or posts or glue. Plus, when we move, we can fold the down in two seconds, wrap it securely, and make sure that the movers don’t gouge it. Highly recommended and I may buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: The top may need some tweaking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with the corner shelf, which I've already reviewed. Sturdy enough (and I can always anchor to a wall if need be). I purchased two of the smaller shelves in order to give myself options for making them side by side. I wish the hardware, which does show, was painted dark in order to hide it a bit better. And, as some folks had indicated, the top does not always fit smoothly/easily on top. I tweaked the pegs with pliers, and got it on okay, but wish the fit had been better. Decent finish, quick to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Robynn Brannen

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy to set up, good amount of storage for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was quick to unfold and throw on the top. They include a tiny bit of glue, and I’m not sure it was enough to secure the top on to the base, because I haven’t tested it, but you could always get your own wood glue to make sure. I’d definitely recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Picture of product misleading
customer_reviews.text: Online picture is deceptive; it turns out that two of the six shelves have significantly low "headroom" for books. It's a problem if you're shelving books, and you don't have a lot of very short paperbacks, and you care something about what order they're in. Seller as well as manufacturer should make shelf dimensions clear, especially if shelves are not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these for my father's suspense novels. They stack and are really sturdy; just be sure to anchor a safety line to the wall to prevent any accident. They are easy to unpack; just watch your fingers so they don't get pinched! The bookcases look really fine when all the books are in them. They were so well packaged. My father loves them and loves having all his books in one place. The shelves are a great size for suspense novels and the color of the shelves is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MayoufromBayou

customer_reviews.title: Oak folding bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and attractive folding bookcase. One important point that is not apparent from the photograph is that the top shelf is only about 6 inches deep, and can only hold unusually small books upright. This is fine for my needs, but that might not be true for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Waltham

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Absurdly easy to assemble, but you will be picking up styrofoam debris for days afterward. Feels very solid, and has a nice finish. I move apartments often, so I'm glad this will be the one piece of furniture where I don't have to worry about organizing parts for reassembly. No tools or screws needed whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: teamaster

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color sent, though quality wood.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cherry and was sent the oak color. The packaging was seriously damaged, but the contents were ok. The anti-tip strap is kind of a joke. I had a heavier duty one I exchanged from a smaller bookshelf to add to this. I like that it can be two separate smaller book shelves or one tall one. I took the advice of another reviewer and bought brackets to place on the back to make sure the two shelves don’t come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Shona C.

customer_reviews.title: (Responsible customer service) Chipped in two places.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Added a star due to quick customer service response. -- Attractive and easy to put up but....two chips in the wood, in spite of very thorough packaging. Ok, it isn't a high-priced item, but it's not cheap either, and I don't expect to see chips right out of the box. Based on other positive reviews, I gather that my experience isn't common...but I felt the need to "report" it anyway. If I can get some kind of customer service on this, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Marja

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookcase but holes on topshelf were misaligned
customer_reviews.text: If not for the misaligned holes on the top shelf, this would have been the perfect bookcase for my need. I hope that the replacement doesn't have the same issue. The color stain in the picture is very accurate. It came with anti-tipping attachments that will let you connect the bookcase to the wall, in case you have little ones that love to climb. I like the clean and simple design. I hope the next one doesn't have an issue because I can see other rooms in our house where I can use this to organize a little.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy multipurpose piece of furniture with no real assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking bookcase/media stand that is solidly put together already. The shelves fold down and just pop on the top shelf. Dowels are already in place in the frame. I liked it so much I bought a second one in the same color. They are identical and so precisely manufactured that I will be able to put a larger TV across both bookcases positioned side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mc

customer_reviews.title: Wood shows through poor paint job
customer_reviews.text: The main issue with this shelf is the poor finish. The white color is uneven because the wood shows through the poor paint job - brush strokes etc show and it looks like it needs another coat of paint. This is not a style, it is just not painted properly. The top shelf had to be forced into place, the shelf unit itself is a bit shaky. I would not suggest buying a taller one than the 3-shelf version because of stability. Overall it suits our purpose in a dorm room but I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: one-of-five

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bookcase for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think that it is a pretty good bookcase. It took me 20 minutes to get it out of all of the packaging and 10 seconds to "put together". I agree with others that I wish all of the shelves were the same height. The top shelf will probably fit mass market paperbacks or knickknacks.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a gal in my mid eighties and had no trouble installing this terrific bookshelf/case. It fits perfectly in my small laundry room/closet, providing lots of storage in limited space. It's a great addition to my apartment. Since it has more shelves than most standard bookcases it was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: giraffe lady

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Solid Construction!!!
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality Solid Construction!!! Perfect for book collectors! Supports heavy books without sagging! Clean lines look good with any interior design style! Frame and shelves fold out for easy assembly. Great for anyone who lives in apartments, dorm rooms, military housing or plans on moving in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed bookcase
customer_reviews.text: This folding bookcase is made well and sturdy. The only criticism is that the upper most book shelf is only a little more than 5 inches in height - too small for most books to stand upright. I used baskets to fill the shelf and put maps, menus, etc. in the baskets. This worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha14

customer_reviews.title: Regency Flip Flop 67 inch high folding bookcase - It's almost like magic
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase is a marvel! No pounding, no tools! Open box, find two folded bookcases with already inserted pegs to enable the new owner to place the bookcase where you wish, open the sides, and with the help of another person, lift the second bookcase and insert the second bookcase's sides onto the lower bookcase's sides. Took no time at all to start organizing our books.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item - packaging is not fun, tho
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding item - solid shelves, sturdy, and super fast setup. Love this bookcase! The packaging uses lots of styrofoam, however...so, of course it can't compress => weighs nothing but takes up lots of space when disposing (even when broken up). Anyway, still 5 stars as the bookcase is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J___

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves, but two shelves for books - one for small nick nacks.
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are sturdy and fairly easy to assemble. The top required a little finessing to fit the holes. Saw somewhere that a review called the cherry color dark, but I'd call it a medium cherry. Definitely not light, but not as dark as mahogany. The third shelf will no even hold paperbacks. You might could place books on their side, but my only use is for some small nick nacks. I bought two units, so I still have room for books. Received in lots of packaging that had to be broken down for the trash.
customer_reviews.author: DianesDeals

customer_reviews.title: Easy, classy bookshelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, ease of assembly, stability. Didn't love the styrofoam bits clinging with static electricity to all of the surfaces. That's a fairly minor complaint, considering the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Oak bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: What beautiful oak wood bookshelf it’s perfect. To make it talk you have to put it together. We were in Impress of the wood how thick. No chips no any problem. If you want real wood this book shelf is. I don’t write many reviews unless I am very impress thank you
customer_reviews.author: ALINE

customer_reviews.title: It's everything I need in a bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while, a consumer makes a purchase that is perfect for that individual. This is how I feel about this bookcase. It's light-weight, sturdy, sets up in mere seconds and folds into nothing. I chose the cherry color which is a lovely warm brown shade. I was so pleased with this piece, I ordered a second one, which arrived today. Now I'm twice as happy.
customer_reviews.author: aries girl

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Once it’s removed from the packing box, move it to the location you want it, open it up and flip the shelves down. That’s all there is to it! It’s substantial and sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cool bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It actually fell together! Was very easy to assemble and move into my room. The only think I'm annoyed with is that the price dropped over $100 the day I received it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest piece of furniture to put together! Hardly anything needed to be done other than the shelf and the top. It's a beautiful addition to my studio.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Culea

customer_reviews.title: Regret that top shelf is warped.
customer_reviews.text: The top shelf is separate and mine was warped, so it would not fit onto the dowels. They don't stock extra top shelves, so you have to return the entire heavy item. Not a good bet to buy, since if one is warped, it is probable there are other warped ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Albert

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: The shelf fits perfectly underneath my counter I only wish the medium oak color was a little less light and a little more medium
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy no assembly except to put the top shelf on
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Just folds out. I will be buying another one soon. I put this in my kitchen for keeping all my cookbooks handy. Love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but color is pretty dark
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my living room. I have several other pieces of furniture that are "Walnut" colored, and I was hoping the color would be a close match. Unfortunately, this piece is quite dark, darker than it looks to me in the picture, I would call it almost an "Espresso" color. Other than that, it seems pretty nice. Easy to set up, and doesn't look cheap. I will keep it even though the color isn't perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Shoe shelving
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid these shelves are a great bargain. They assemble easily-- open the sides, fold down the shelves. Only slight problems when I stacked the two shelves together. had to use a rubber mallet to secure them to my satisfaction. I was able to increase the numbers of shelves by putting boards in the places where there were not shelves using the side crossbars to hold them on. I use them for shoe shelves in a big walk-in closet
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Beefy

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described, (mostly) assembled and ready to unfold. The lower and upper halves are separated for shipment (I couldn't have carried a single piece this large up my staircase), the finish is good, and it does the job intended. Being open on the sides and back have both pros and cons: air gets to circulate around the back, but small items stacked horizontally may crawl out occasionally. Books, CDs, and DVDs standing vertically tend to behave and stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Box and product came damaged. One leg was broken, bottom shelf could not be secured as intended. Bought for my mother in assisted living for the ease of assembly. Had to junk it at the assisted living facility. Probably lost my money. 1 star for nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen W

customer_reviews.title: No assembly needed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, inexpensive, and best of all, did not need assembly. I put it in a closet and am using it for much needed storage. It holds quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf. Easy to set up and quite sturdy. The box was mangled when it arrived, but the contents were well packaged and everything was in good shape when I put the shelf together.
customer_reviews.author: Don H Slee

customer_reviews.title: Totally beautiful and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Totally beautiful and easy to put up. Received four and assembled and put in place (very little to be done) all within a little over an hour. I'm 68 years old, 5 feet 1 inch and weigh 115 pounds, so this should give you an idea as to how easy it is. I had them filled within a couple of hours and they are absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was excellent - box was dented by delivery but because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality solid wood. Fit together perfectly in less than 5 minutes. Packaging was excellent - box was dented by delivery but because of how well it was packed, not a scratch on item. Box had openings on all sides to make it really easy to remove from box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's well made (hard wood) but poorly balanced. In ...
customer_reviews.text: It's well made (hard wood) but poorly balanced. In short, you really do need to secure this to the wall in order to prevent it from tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: jose bey

customer_reviews.title: Better  quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected. I purchased two of them for a small apartment. The cherry color selected looks great. They practically put themselves together after unfolding them. The top shelf holds my larger books fine on their sides.
customer_reviews.author: David Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, No Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Is all it should be though I used my own straps to anchor to wall. Need to watch the shelves when unfolding and setting up because they can and do fall down and could be a head-knocker or finger masher.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I opened up the sides and the shelves just slapped into place. It was well-wrapped although I found a teeny-tiny chip on one of the shelf corners. I wish I had gotten one of these before bought another "high end" bookcase which I had to put together myself & couldn't relocate alone. This is an awesome bookcase. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine L. Puliti

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This looks much nicer than the price indicates. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product.
customer_reviews.text: Had to rearrange my books/CDs/DVDS so I needed extra shelves. Love this product. Just open and unfold. Well made. Worth the price as I was looking for a well made product for months. Would highly recommend this Regency Flip Flop Folding Bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Cool NY Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Even tho this product is a little more expensive it's worth it. I now have two book cases. They are well packed, sturdy and look good, not to mention the easiest assembly ever.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Manjo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all around
customer_reviews.text: Was better than I expected. Well made, the color is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bj patrick

customer_reviews.title: SO happy!
customer_reviews.text: These bookcases were so much nicer than I imagined! They fit in my living room perfectly and hold a ton of books! Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: DeadAeris

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I wanted to use it for.
customer_reviews.text: Great for people who are terrible at putting furniture together. It is just as described, open, snap the top on, bookshelf assembled.
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: NO ASSEMBLY YAY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, no assembly . Easy to store and holds all my books when fully opened. Pretty color and attractive in my den. I’d buy more
customer_reviews.author: a. parr

customer_reviews.title: Truly, NO ASSEMBLY
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father. It requires only to be removed from the box and it "falls into place"! It is beautiful! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: lbwg

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Like durability and solidity plus easy set up. Used for books. Only minor complaint is short height of enclosed top shelf with top on, but I knew the dimensions before buying so that was not a surprise. I use bookends on the top to create a fourth shelf
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Tribbett

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this book case
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this book case. It's attractive, well made and sturdy. Perfect size for an office or small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: tomrock

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Constructed well
customer_reviews.text: Love it . Constructed well, easy to assemble, quality piece
customer_reviews.author: fun to play...challenging puzzle option

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to attach to wall for stability.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these--far superior to particle board. I was able to slide the box into my office, unbox the shelves, and set them up. They come in 2 parts that stack up to make 6 shelves. I ended up deciding not to stack them--leaving 2 sets of 3 shelves. There are some visible pegs that don't bother me, and I can easily move them this way. If you do set up the whole thing, you are supposed to attach it with screws to the wall. Without that, it might be wobbly--I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design, sturdy, and no assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Quality shelf that is elegant and sturdy. I love that there was no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Peacebaby70

customer_reviews.title: Up and running in less than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this! Sturdy, looks great, assembly couldn't be more simple - which is the principle reason I purchased it. Had the whole thing ready to go in less than 20 minutes, about 15 of which were spent getting it out of the box, because it was packaged so well. Definitely thinking about buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Naffky

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but was expecting to use ANY tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Not particle board. The only thing I was disappointed in was that you had to screw the top together and not just unfold it like a shorter 1 we already have.
customer_reviews.author: Jlamothe

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful book shelf that is practical and stylish. I would buy this again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Bookcase fit need for small bins and displays in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bookcase fit need for small bins and displays in my foyer area. Color is a distressed white, not a true white, but it goes well with my wall color. Bookcase quickly flipped open once out of box; removing it from shipping box took longer than setting bookcase up. It was well-wrapped with no damage. At some point I will paint metal screws white; they are a coppery color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm room
customer_reviews.text: Nice materials and just what we needed for a dorm room. The second shelf down is very shallow and is really only good for stacking papers or notebooks. It is odd that they are not evenly spaced.
customer_reviews.author: Free To Be Me

customer_reviews.title: Love these bookcases
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bookcases. I had one and needed another. Price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Devlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Super easy to put together. Looks great. I use it as a shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty, and sturdy and EASY
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and used them on top of my desk to add shelving. They are pretty, and sturdy and EASY, no assembly! I'm thinking of ordering the tall one also.
customer_reviews.author: Bowzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to fold up. Perfect in my RV when I need extra shelf space but can tuck it away for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BayLadyBlue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and can be used for cloth storage cubes or basket bins
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best folding shelves for the money
customer_reviews.text: Shipped these shelves to my son in the Navy and he loves them! Said they are very sturdy and hold his heavier historical books nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Michele H

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for what I needed. Sturdy and hold a lot of books. Plus it is easily moved. I am super pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Benz

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well finished, and so nice not the have to assemble anything!
customer_reviews.author: Knitnut

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, a TAD wobbly but not necessary to drill to wall unless maybe you have kiddos who will hang on it. LOL... Looks beautiful and I got the cherry color! GET ONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I can handle them by myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 to use for shows. Works great and I can handle them by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful solid wood
customer_reviews.text: I love my new book shelves from Regency. I purchased the medium oak and it’s a lovely color. The wood is beautiful and arrived without a scratch, very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Conway

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value, easy to unfold.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my elderly mother, and it's fantastic. You just flip it open right out of the package. The quality is way better than I'd expected at this price. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Global Prof

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size and shape for the space where I wanted it. Easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Guarina

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Easy to assemble. Just had to place one section above the other. Sides are hinged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality!! Solid hardwood. Came assembled. This shelf if perfect in every way. I needed to get a shelf into a closet with limited space. I was able to put in into the closet an unfold it where I needed between the washer and wall because it is collapsable!!
customer_reviews.author: AMYANN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice. Takes 5 mins to set up. A great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bookcase. I hate having to assemble furniture that you buy online. This couldn't be easier. Taking it out of the packaging will take longer than setting it up. It's sturdy and looks great. Wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these shelves I bought. Great quality and price! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together & is a great addition to my study/studio. Attractive & practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Great bookcases
customer_reviews.text: Almost exactly what I wanted. I would have liked a light oak color, and these are medium oak, but otherwise perfect. Good price and quick shipping, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Easy to put together. Looks really nice. I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful little bedside bookcase...love it! SO easy to fold out.
customer_reviews.author: SallyGooden

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship and very well packed
customer_reviews.text: Great craftsmanship and very well packed. Easy to setup and looks beautiful in our den. We had some oversized books so I decided not to put the top shelf on and carefully sawed off the top dowels. Setup took 20 minutes tops.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, sturdy construction, my only complaint is that the smaller shelves in height are not big enough to put books in so it is wasted space.
customer_reviews.author: David LaForest

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookcase in the summer of 2012. It was delivered on time. The box is very heavy and you will need help to lift it. Its solid quality wood and very easy to put together. I paid $277.00 for mine. Now that its $205.00, I am going to purchase another one. I recommend this bookcase for anyone who is looking for a quality bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: No tools required for assembly, just unpack and unfold. It's good-looking and sturdy, and works perfectly in my smallish guest bedroom where it doubles as an end table. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Woolf

customer_reviews.title: sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up. and it is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: AvidShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific book case: it looks expensive, it's beautiful, sturdy, and sets up in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bookcase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and exactly as represented in the ad. I especially like the shelf on top. And it can be fastened to the wall - important if you live in earthquake country as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Catcher

customer_reviews.title: Best Bookcase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and stuffed with books in about 5 minutes! The hardest part about getting this bookshelf ready to go was getting the tape off the box in which it came. It was packed well and came out perfect. I am very happy with this purchase. It was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy & Archie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a person with arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an open backed bookcase to replace one that was up against a bedroom wall next to the bathroom. The heavy duty one we had always smelled musty. I also wanted a bookcase that wouldn't be hard for someone with arthritis to put up. And, of course, I wanted it to look good and not be flimsy. This was perfect. It's not solid oak, but that wouldn't work for the spot I wanted. It is lightweight, sturdy, easy to put up, came to directly to the door in great shape, is well aerated, looks nice, and holds a lot. Very happy with it and the process of putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Frick

customer_reviews.title: I love the bookcase itself
customer_reviews.text: I love the bookcase itself, however, I ordered the medium oak and received the dark walnut color which is not at all the color I wanted. The construction of the bookcase is wonderful and I haven't seen an issue with tipping as other have.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Odermann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are so easy to use and set up in a snap. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. It was easy to put up, and looks geart.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use no assembly needed
customer_reviews.text: Great book shelves that look much more expensive than they were. And as a single woman the whole idea of being able to just unfold them and have them look good was a real plus. The only thing that would have been better is that the shelves don't adjust so you have to take the height they give you.
customer_reviews.author: mothermadrigal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have all my children's books on it and can acces them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this book shelf. Easy peasy to set up & looks great!!! Going to get another one.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a good price. I hate to assemble things so this was perfect for me.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and professional rack. It looks great in my office.

customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Easily put together. Very nice wood. and ships fast!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size and the wood is a good product. East to put together (in fact super simple) and we are happy with the size and color

product_meta.title: Regency Flip Flop 67-inch High Folding Bookcase- Medium Oak
product_meta.description: Size:67" x 30"| Color:Medium OakThe dorm-room ready Flip Flop collection saves time and money. These folding bookcases unfold into place right out of the box and assemble in less than 5 minutes. This 67" High Bookcase is constructed of a solid hardwood frame and is finished in a classic Medium Oak hand-rubbed veneer. Its 6 fixed shelves flip down from storage position and rest securely in place on shelf supports. A top shelf attaches securely without the use of tools and assembly is finished! Perfect for the home and office alike, this bookcase looks great in living rooms, next to desks or as media storage and folds up for easy transportation and storage when not in use.
feature_bullets: Shelves flip up and whole bookcase folds flat for easy transportation and storage
Assembles without tools in less than 5 minutes
6 flip-down shelves and one fixed top shelf
Solid hardwood frame with classic Medium Oak hand-rubbed veneer finish
Perfect for homes, offices, dorm rooms and with other Flip Flop bookcases
